name: Magalaga
description:
Z / N  =  SHOOT

Take down the greatest country in the world and their leader, while playing a minigame inspired by the arcade classics!

This game is inspired by the all time arcade classic; Galaga!

In order to get power-ups you have to shoot objects such as:

    White plastic cup with green round logo
    Yellow M with red background
    Primary coloured capital G
    Rainbow fan with white letters beneath
    Bitten white fruit

    When shooting these objects, power-ups appear! 

    All power-ups have different advantages

    Red cup white lid - faster shooting

    Long bread with sausage covered in sauce - faster movement

    Meat between sesame buns - extra life
